isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - CAB ACCESSORIES - DESCRIPTION - OWNER/OPERATOR CONNECTIONS - REAR CAB JUNCTION BLOCK, ACCESSORY RELAY

svcproc.title: OWNER/OPERATOR CONNECTIONS - REAR CAB JUNCTION BLOCK, ACCESSORY RELAY
svcproc.para: Provision is made for the owner/operator to wire accessories to the vehicle electrical system. Battery power for these accessories is available at 30 amp fuse F10 in the main fuse block.

The optional rear cab junction box provides a rear cab location for the owner/operator and/or body builder to wire accessories to the vehicle electrical system. Key switch controlled accessory power is available on circuit 12A through the 20 amp fuse F15 and accessory relay 179.
